content: HMH SS 304 Nail-in anchor Economical nail-in anchor (stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy fastening for maximum speed and installation Low profile mushroom head style provides a nice finish and tamper proof fastening Consistent load values for light duty fastenings in concrete and masonry Choice of stainless steel or carbon steel nail for indoor or outdoor use Applications Light duty fastening in concrete or masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Rounded head Environmental conditions: Outdoor Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Rounded head | Environmental conditions | Outdoor | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A2 | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 230567 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1 SS - Package Size 100 pc - 308495 - Metal anchor HIT 1/4 x 1 w/SS nail MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1 SS - 230568 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1-1/4 SS - Package Size 100 pc - 308496 - Metal anchor HIT HMH SS 1/4 x 1-1/4 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1-1/4 SS - 230569 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1-1/2 SS - Package Size 100 pc - 308497 - Metal anchor HIT HMH SS 1/4 x 1-1/2 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 1-1/2 SS - 230570 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 2 SS - Package Size 100 pc - 308498 - Metal anchor HIT 1/4 x 2 w/SS nail MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 2 SS - 2173260 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 2-1/2 SS - Package Size 100 pc - 2173261 - Metal anchor HIT HMH 1/4 x 3 SS - Package Size 50 pc
